properties.areaDesc: Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country
properties.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 13 at 3:09AM AKST until January 13 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. The cold wind chills
will cause frostbite in as little as 10 minutes to exposed
skin. Expect wind chills to range from 20 below zero to 50
below zero.

* WHERE...Upper Yukon River Valley and the Fortymile Country.

* WHEN...Now to noon.
properties.instruction:
A Wind Chill Advisory means that cold air and sustained wind
speeds of 15 mph or more will create low wind chills. Frost bite
and hypothermia can occur if precautions are not taken.

NWSheadline: WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST TODAY
